main.name: TripOptimizer
main.bio: The proposed tool aims to provide non-car users with the most efficient and cost-effective way to reach their destination by integrating various modes of transportation, including public transit and rideshare services. Unlike existing solutions that typically display only one type of transport route, this tool will combine public transport and rideshare options such as Uber and Didi to optimize both travel time and cost.
